name: Overview
data:
[{"id":"9f100d36-a74a-4d8b-8c55-6dc04bd2a9ee","type":"heading","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left","level":3,"isToggleable":false},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"Group: URI and Namespace Resolution","styles":{}}],"children":[]},{"id":"107cc86f-1eaa-418d-9524-176978596439","type":"heading","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left","level":4,"isToggleable":false},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"Group Description","styles":{}}],"children":[]},{"id":"c699dbb0-1d1b-44e7-bc78-d6ed51d91699","type":"paragraph","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"This group is responsible for translating Python modules, namespaces, classes, and functions into standardized FASTEN Uniform Resource Identifiers (URIs). It defines the rules and mechanisms used to normalize names, distinguish internal from external entities, and ensure consistent referencing across all generated FASTEN artifacts.","styles":{}}],"children":[]},{"id":"5bf77f2e-674a-4de5-a4d0-01a75a8a71b6","type":"paragraph","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"In addition to URI construction, this group builds lookup structures that enable efficient resolution of namespaces during call graph and class hierarchy generation. Together, these functions form the backbone of identity management within the FASTEN formatting process.","styles":{}}],"children":[]},{"id":"b88eb192-7c7f-48c1-82c0-c3057acb3f3c","type":"divider","props":{},"children":[]},{"id":"b8c0a175-cd44-4973-9f91-b47ea901226a","type":"heading","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left","level":4,"isToggleable":false},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"Function: to_uri","styles":{}}],"children":[]},{"id":"a0e4165f-3171-4624-b355-be11a53f088a","type":"paragraph","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"Description

","styles":{"bold":true}},{"type":"text","text":"The ","styles":{}},{"type":"text","text":"to_uri","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":" function constructs a FASTEN-compliant URI for internal modules, namespaces, or functions. It normalizes module names, validates that namespaces are correctly scoped to their modules, and generates a consistent identifier used throughout the FASTEN output.","styles":{}}],"children":[]},{"id":"97fe5e02-be1e-4500-8c5b-796ef113d047","type":"paragraph","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"Detailed Behavior","styles":{"bold":true}}],"children":[]},{"id":"62f33ee9-b32f-4ebd-be30-b878997b4ac7","type":"bulletListItem","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"Accepts a module name and an optional fully qualified namespace or function name","styles":{}}],"children":[]},{"id":"de3ee13f-801c-482c-90e8-5400bfbf1c4b","type":"bulletListItem","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"Verifies that the namespace belongs to the specified module","styles":{}}],"children":[]},{"id":"1364e74d-7f9d-4d6f-bcba-fada82445397","type":"bulletListItem","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"Strips the module prefix to create a relative namespace path","styles":{}}],"children":[]},{"id":"b0c85aa7-52b8-44fa-8d54-e10efddd2425","type":"bulletListItem","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"Replaces unsupported characters (such as hyphens) to conform to FASTEN naming rules","styles":{}}],"children":[]},{"id":"57edaaf6-ffe2-4885-97fa-79e952c916fb","type":"bulletListItem","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"Appends a ","styles":{}},{"type":"text","text":"()","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":" suffix when the name corresponds to a function","styles":{}}],"children":[]},{"id":"9257c72f-d88e-4e52-b49e-b7e72eac1d0d","type":"paragraph","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"Role in the Group

","styles":{"bold":true}},{"type":"text","text":"This function provides the canonical internal representation for all code elements defined within the analyzed package. Its output is later mapped to numeric identifiers and reused across modules, class hierarchies, and call graphs.","styles":{}}],"children":[]},{"id":"f1a20ba4-251f-4f60-a4ae-c67511282328","type":"divider","props":{},"children":[]},{"id":"54f04626-ab40-40cf-b290-c916cb5cb8cf","type":"heading","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left","level":4,"isToggleable":false},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"Function: to_external_uri","styles":{}}],"children":[]},{"id":"2f2f4362-d480-4bbf-8a7d-a307ddc8b090","type":"paragraph","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"Description

","styles":{"bold":true}},{"type":"text","text":"The ","styles":{}},{"type":"text","text":"to_external_uri","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":" function generates FASTEN URIs for modules and namespaces that are external to the analyzed package. These URIs preserve external identity while clearly distinguishing external references from internal ones.","styles":{}}],"children":[]},{"id":"e0dc83f6-2394-4e99-94af-b3fa343259ab","type":"paragraph","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"Detailed Behavior","styles":{"bold":true}}],"children":[]},{"id":"8f869302-bc4f-4f31-88bd-efbae2472b9f","type":"bulletListItem","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"Accepts an external module name and a fully qualified namespace","styles":{}}],"children":[]},{"id":"ea4dca4d-fe92-4897-90e8-a3d5d62bc492","type":"bulletListItem","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"Normalizes module names to comply with FASTEN conventions","styles":{}}],"children":[]},{"id":"ee039f19-ca88-4f76-a18c-3300f0df6bcd","type":"bulletListItem","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"Handles Python built-in modules by remapping them to a dedicated ","styles":{}},{"type":"text","text":".builtin","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":" namespace","styles":{}}],"children":[]},{"id":"e71c4c2c-57a5-4860-a4be-c912cb6e6c71","type":"bulletListItem","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"Produces a URI format that clearly denotes external ownership","styles":{}}],"children":[]},{"id":"017b4d52-3290-4422-9afd-e87517dfbef0","type":"paragraph","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"Role in the Group

","styles":{"bold":true}},{"type":"text","text":"This function ensures that external dependencies and library calls are represented consistently and unambiguously. By isolating external URIs from internal identifiers, it enables accurate separation of internal and external calls in the call graph.","styles":{}}],"children":[]},{"id":"4e0b5d48-2b2e-4354-9748-24f1e68e5116","type":"divider","props":{},"children":[]},{"id":"1dcdcf5a-f496-4cae-bce0-6aa869f8e604","type":"heading","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left","level":4,"isToggleable":false},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"Function: create_namespaces_map","styles":{}}],"children":[]},{"id":"2869388d-325e-4d4f-a316-f0c968b745c2","type":"paragraph","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"Description

","styles":{"bold":true}},{"type":"text","text":"The ","styles":{}},{"type":"text","text":"create_namespaces_map","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":" function builds lookup tables that map namespaces to their corresponding modules for both internal and external code. These mappings provide a fast way to determine the origin of a namespace during graph construction.","styles":{}}],"children":[]},{"id":"1da32d76-8773-46e9-9cad-8d8a936d2438","type":"paragraph","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"Detailed Behavior","styles":{"bold":true}}],"children":[]},{"id":"33c08c72-af37-40ab-8735-10807aec86fa","type":"bulletListItem","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"Iterates over internal and external module definitions","styles":{}}],"children":[]},{"id":"b6c8cd79-4d06-4cd8-9e2d-d0f7e668abb2","type":"bulletListItem","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"Extracts all known namespaces for each module","styles":{}}],"children":[]},{"id":"498a548b-2cd4-4ebc-9129-72bc1001c7f4","type":"bulletListItem","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"Produces two dictionaries: one for internal namespaces and one for external namespaces","styles":{}}],"children":[]},{"id":"a18077d1-bc7b-4e0a-876d-2a766ea178e9","type":"paragraph","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"Role in the Group

","styles":{"bold":true}},{"type":"text","text":"This function enables efficient resolution of call graph endpoints by identifying whether a given namespace is internal or external. It eliminates repeated searches and simplifies the logic used in call graph and class hierarchy generation.","styles":{}}],"children":[]},{"id":"52ad8166-4dc6-4d53-98e6-5fd2ae7e6dca","type":"divider","props":{},"children":[]},{"id":"2d136b6a-0faf-4d41-a8af-d3fd69e948d1","type":"paragraph","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"Design Perspective","styles":{"bold":true}}],"children":[]},{"id":"836103f8-75bd-4017-9ffd-a85adb3b05f0","type":"paragraph","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"Together, the functions in this group establish a consistent identity and resolution model for the entire FASTEN formatter. By separating URI construction from note resolution and lookup logic, the design promotes clarity, correctness, and extensibility.","styles":{}}],"children":[]},{"id":"f365efe4-e70b-4303-b400-1a767178ac2a","type":"divider","props":{},"children":[]},{"id":"877914c7-7b2c-4fb8-abe7-2bc1c15052c2","type":"paragraph","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[],"children":[]}]
